articles.author: Bill Chappell
articles.title: Who is Lachlan Murdoch, the anointed media tycoon? - NPR
articles.description: His position in leading News Corp. and Fox is now secure, as his father ends a dramatic succession battle. Lachlan grew up in New York City but has lived in Australia for much of his adult life.
articles.content: Rupert Murdoch, 94, has anointed Lachlan Murdoch, his oldest son, as leader for decades to come, of a conservative media empire that includes Fox News, the The Wall Street Journal and the New York Po… [+5674 chars]
